entities.name: dark stone tunnel
entities.description: The dark stone tunnel is described as large enough to stand in. It has slimy walls and the floor is wet.

entities.name: lockhart
entities.description: Lockhart is described as getting to his feet a little way away, covered in slime and white as a ghost.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as standing aside as Ron comes out of the pipe, and later he lights his wand with 'Lumos!' to illuminate their path.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as coming whizzing out of the pipe, covered in slime, and later stepping on something that makes a loud crunch sound.

entities.name: pipe
entities.description: The pipe is mentioned as an entrance to the dark stone tunnel.

entities.name: school
entities.description: The school is mentioned as being above them, with Harry saying 'We must be miles under the school'.

relationships.description: Harry and Lockhart are standing near each other in the dark stone tunnel.
Harry and Ron are walking together in the dark stone tunnel, with Harry lighting their path with his wand.
Ron comes out of the pipe into the dark stone tunnel.
Harry mentions that they must be miles under the school.
